import * as React from "react"; import { useCart } from "../context/CartContext"; const Cart = () => { const { cart } = useCart(); const { removeItem } = useCart(); const { clear } = useCart(); console.log(cart) let subtotal = 0; let envio = 0; let total = 0; return ( <>
{cart?.map((item) => { subtotal += (item.price * item.qty); return ( ) })} {envio = parseFloat(subtotal * 0.15)} {total = parseFloat(subtotal + envio)}
Producto Disponibilidad Cantidad Precio
${item.title} En stock ${item.price}
Sub-Total {subtotal}
Envío {envio}
Total {total}
Continuar Comprando
Finalizar Compra
); }; export default Cart;
